short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A high-quality cookie manager with stylish design, convenient operation, and rich features.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
💐 💐 💐 一款集颜值、操作、功能于一体的高质量 Cookie 管理器。
A high-quality cookie manager that combines aesthetics, functionality, and ease of use.

💁💁💁 该扩展的导入导出功能可以实现一些网站的账号共享功能，将你导出的文件或者复制的内容发送给你值得信赖的小伙伴，即可实现多人共享账号。比如知乎、爱奇艺、优酷、新东方、掘金、v2、github 等。

This extension's import and export feature allows for account sharing on certain websites. By sending the exported file or copied content to a trusted friend, multiple people can share the same account. 

1. 便捷的增、删、改、查。
Convenient addition, deletion, modification, and search of cookies.

2. 监控所有 JS 操作 cookie 变化的动作并打印在控制台上（前端开发者利好）。
Convenient addition, deletion, modification, and search of cookies.
Monitors all JavaScript operations on cookie changes and prints them in the console (beneficial for front-end developers).

3. 文件导入、文件导出、删除、全屏操作、批量操作。
File import, file export, delete, fullscreen operation, batch operation.

4. 支持 json 格式、header string 格式的复制。
Support copying in JSON format and header string format.

5. 支持检索根域名下所有子域名的 Cookie。
Supports retrieving cookies from all subdomains under the root domain.

6. 支持 name、value、domain、path 等多列数据检索。
Supports searching by multiple columns such as name, value, domain, path, etc.

7. 支持 “关注” 某 cookie，置顶特殊显示。
Allows "following" a specific cookie, highlighting it at the top for special display.

8. 支持 “Cookie 安全卫士”，用户可以配置在访问某些站点时，禁用某些扩展，离开时激活。
Support "Cookie Security Guard", users can configure to disable certain extensions when accessing certain sites and activate them when leaving.

9. 支持无痕模式。
Supports incognito mode.

10. 32 款精致主题色、N 款背景渐变色、多个关注图标 你想要的样子我都有。
Offers 32 exquisite themes, numerous gradient backgrounds, and multiple follow icons—whatever style you want, we have it.

 🏖 🏖 🏖 我们专注于提供简单易用的 Cookie 管理解决方案，为您的网络浏览带来更好的体验。无论您是普通用户还是专业开发人员，Best Cookier 都能满足您的需求。
We focus on providing a simple and easy-to-use cookie management solution to enhance your web browsing experience. Whether you are a regular user or a professional developer, Best Cookier can meet your needs.

🐛🐛🐛 如果有新的功能需求或者错误报告，欢迎在 github issues 模块进行反馈。
If you have new feature requests or bug reports, feel free to provide feedback through the GitHub issues module.
